item.title: Contact form 1

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded: This is the Parent page for the homepage sections. Don't edit this page, instead, go to Settings - Reading and set it as Front Page.

item.title: Slider (company presentation)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1491397754155{padding-top: 90px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

Meet Nexx Theme

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

Get started with any of the demos with only one click! Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported in the process. There is no need for additional settings or plugin uploads. Nexx is packed with the best website building features.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="PURCHASE" style="outline-custom" outline_custom_color="#d60274" outline_custom_hover_background="#d60274" outline_custom_hover_text="#ffffff" align="center" css_animation="fadeIn" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Fnexx-multi-purpose-business-wordpress-theme%2F19851428||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1493209794817{padding-top: 100px !important;}"]

features

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]Nexx is packed with the best website building features ever: Visual Composer, Revolution Slider, 80+ Page Elements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1493209804535{padding-top: 100px !important;}"]

one click install

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]Get started with any of the demos with only one click! There is no need for additional settings or plugin uploads. Just try it.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1493209812310{padding-top: 100px !important;}"]

freedom

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]Nexx is an awesome theme that allows you to built your site extremly easy and also allows you to tell your story in a unique way.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row gap="35" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1491402887724{padding-top: 125px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="37" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

01

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493210060206{margin-top: -160px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}"]

Few Words About

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493210130991{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-left: 9px !important;}"]Nexx is an excellent theme series allowing you to build your site the easy way, and it lets you tell your story in a powerful way. You just need to try this theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1491402862874{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 65px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

02

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493210091705{margin-top: -160px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}"]

Few Words About

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493210271531{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-left: 9px !important;}"]You can effortlessly create your website with One Click Install. Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported. Convince yourself.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="41" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: History (company presentation)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1491403026238{padding-top: 65px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

The Guide To Living Creatively

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1491403014109{padding-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]Nexx is an excellent theme series allowing you to build your site the easy way, and it lets you tell your story in a powerful narrative in an engaging way, making it perfect for all businesses. Get started with either of the demos with only one click![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]You can effortlessly create your website with One Click Install. Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported. in the process. There is no need for additional settings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]You can create the perfect header for your website. Choose between various layouts and behaviours. You get 3 Layout Styles.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]Switch between full width or boxed and control the container width on the majority of device screens.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]12.11.2017[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1492717976457{padding-top: 55px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_btn title="CONTACT US" style="outline-custom" outline_custom_color="#d60274" outline_custom_hover_background="#d60274" outline_custom_hover_text="#ffffff" align="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Fnexx-multi-purpose-business-wordpress-theme%2F19851428||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our Team (company presentation)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1492718004326{padding-top: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Our Crew

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Almost every layout or styling option can be set using the Theme Options Panel. Go on and see impressive features in action!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1491427615387{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="63" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491425148786{padding-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

frances ross

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492642990478{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

CEO

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493221850087{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

Good ranking requires relevant content, but it’s our duty to ensure proper code helping you score better on Google.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="65" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491425260414{padding-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

john wright

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492642999129{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

Programmer

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493221827909{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

This theme is based on Bootstrap Framework, meaning it was built mobile first. Everything looks perfect on mobile.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="64" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491425309352{padding-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

julie dennis

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492643009946{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

Support

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493221801051{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

Our support team is here to help you, usually answering within one business day. You also get lifetime updates.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our Clients (company presentation)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1491430170922{padding-top: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Our Beloved Customers

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Use ‘One-Click’ import to get a head start and save valuable time when building your website. Just try and convince yourself.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1491427908484{padding-bottom: 65px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="80" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491428260517{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="79" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491428265127{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="77" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491428275987{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="78" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491428280631{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="80" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491428285501{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_single_image image="79" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491428290402{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
